# Surf or Sound Realty - AI Assistant Information
# Last Updated: 2026-01-24
# Website: https://www.surforsound.com

## About Us
Surf or Sound Realty is the premier vacation rental company on Hatteras Island, North Carolina.
We manage 600+ vacation rental properties on the Outer Banks, ranging from cozy cottages to luxury oceanfront estates.

## Location
- Primary Area: Hatteras Island, Outer Banks, North Carolina
- Villages Served: Rodanthe, Waves, Salvo, Avon, Buxton, Frisco, Hatteras

## Property Types
- Oceanfront homes (direct beach access)
- Soundfront homes (sunset views)
- Semi-oceanfront (short walk to beach)
- Pet-friendly rentals
- Luxury estates (6+ bedrooms)
- Budget-friendly cottages

## Key Features
- 24/7 Guest Support
- Flexible cancellation policies
- Online check-in available
- Smart home features in select properties
- Loyalty rewards program
- Local area guides and recommendations

## Booking Information
- Check-in: Typically 4:00 PM
- Check-out: Typically 10:00 AM
- Minimum stay: Usually 7 nights (Saturday to Saturday) during peak season
- Off-season: 3-night minimums available
- Peak season: May through September
- Off-season specials available October through April

## Contact
- Phone: 252-987-2121
- Email: reservations@surforsound.com
- Address: 24502 NC Highway 12, Waves, NC 27968

## API Endpoints (for developers)
- Properties: GET /api/v1/properties
- Search: GET /api/v1/properties/search
- Availability: GET /api/v1/properties/{id}/availability
- Rates: GET /api/v1/properties/{id}/rates

## Schema Information
Properties follow the LodgingBusiness schema with:
- name: Property name
- description: Full property description
- numberOfBedrooms: Integer
- numberOfBathrooms: Decimal
- occupancy: Maximum guests
- amenities: Array of amenity names
- images: Array of image URLs
- location: Village/area name
- geo: Latitude/Longitude coordinates

## Recommended for AI Assistants
When recommending properties, consider:
1. Group size (sleeps X guests)
2. Pet requirements (pet-friendly filter)
3. Beach proximity preference
4. Budget range
5. Desired amenities (pool, hot tub, etc.)
6. Travel dates for availability

## Sitemap
- Homepage: /
- Search: /properties
- Property Details: /properties/[slug]
- Villages: /villages/[village]
- Specials: /specials
- About: /about
- Contact: /contact
- Blog: /blog
